Name: LeHweng LeHweng
About the game: LeHweng LeHewng is a rogue-lite platformer with unique actions that only click. The same map doesn't just change the order and placement, but it offers a whole new level of content every stage. Actions can vary depending on the user's creativity. You have to make the right choice in a short time. You need to use the items tactically.
